title: HTML-Only Interactive Story
description: A short interactive story about an abandoned mansion built using exclusively HTML
learned: Building simple web pages & writing semantic HTML

title: Pure CSS Kitty
description: A CSS recreation of a drawing found online, with the additional constraint of not utilizing absolute positioning
learned: Basic CSS concepts surrounding positioning, layouts & styling

title: JS-Only Chat App
description: A frontend for a very simple chat app API using exclusively JavaScript for HTML element creation & styling
learned: Basic JavaScript concepts, DOM modification, styling & element creation utilizing JS

title: Series Tracker API
description: A REST API for giving functionality to an already existing frontend
learned: Backend development, REST API documentation & Docker for application deployment
